projects.subtitle: WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT & DESIGN
projects.title: DEEDEVELOPER.COM
projects.content: Deedeveloper.com is a meticulously designed, professional freelance development platform showcasing the expertise and services of a seasoned developer. The website serves as an interactive portfolio, detailing the developer's projects, personal profile, offered services, and much more. Notably, it features a comprehensive blog section along with an accessible feedback system for seamless communication and engagement with potential clients.

projects.title: WAGEFIGURER
projects.content:
WageFigurer is a powerful mobile application designed to streamline the financial management of cabbies, by allowing them to easily calculate and save mileage records, expenses, and net-paying reports. It is an all-in-one solution that empowers workers and owners to stay in control of their finances, making tax time a breeze.

With WageFigurer, users can easily categorize expenses and mileage/kilometer (KM) data,...  read more? (click on 'View Project')

projects.subtitle: AWS ENVIRONMENT
projects.title: DESIGN & IMPLEMENTATION
projects.content: Today, Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers a wide range of cloud-based services that provide scalable, on-demand resources. These services enable businesses to operate more swiftly and efficiently, enhancing their overall productivity and scalability. This study discusses a use-case scenario involving various AWS services, including the Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), Elastic Cloud Compute (EC2), Relational Database Service (RDS), and Elastic Block Storage (EBS). These services are utilized to create a robust database infrastructure. The described scenario is particularly relevant for businesses requiring continuous uptime, such as e-commerce platforms that need their databases to be consistently available, secure, and capable of scaling on demand. The infrastructure outlined in this study not only secures the database within private subnets but also guarantees its high availability across multiple availability zones.

projects.subtitle: Disruption Report
projects.title: Disrupting TV Industry with Brain Computer Interface
projects.content: According to Cl√©ment (2019) a direct link between the human brain and outside devices is created through brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), also known as brain machine interfaces (BMIs). BCIs were developed to improve or restore cognitive and sensory-motor abilities. They use electrical impulses generated by brain activity to control everything from computers to artificial limbs. Invasive (within the brain), partially invasive (under the skull, outside the brain), and non-invasive, like EEG electrodes, are some of their several types (Cl√©ment, 2019).

projects.subtitle: AGILE
projects.title: AGILE PROJECT MANAGEMENT
projects.content: I got practical skills and experience with running Agile projects, and understands how Agile can be put to use to manage everything from product development to project management, across any industry. Agile Project Management has been developed in partnership with ThoughtWorks.

projects.subtitle: CYBER SECURITY
projects.title: CYBER SECURITY RISK AND STRATEGY
projects.content: This credential approves my understanding of threats and risks posed by cyber attacks, and making me know how to create an effective cybersecurity strategy ‚Äì one that takes into account legal and regulatory requirements, and lets the business promptly respond to incidents, limit damage from attacks and quickly recover any information compromised by hacks. Cybersecurity Risk and Strategy has been developed in partnership with NAB and Palo Alto Networks.
